2-20 mcg/kg/min × 97.5 kg (7.3125-73.125 mL/hr, rounded to 7.31-73.13 mL/hr), Intravenous, at 7.31-73.13 mL/hr, Titrated, Starting Mon 10/5/15 at 0000
Initiate dopamine infusion at 2 mcg/kg/min if SBP less than 90 mmHg. Titrate to keep MAP above 65 mmHg. Titrate by 2 mcg/kg/min every 5 minutes. Do not exceed 20 mcg/kg/min.
